objective: Highly motivated Computer Science student with a strong focus on Artificial Intelligence. Aiming to leverage technical expertise in machine learning and deep learning to drive innovation and solve complex problems.

experience.details: Worked on building AI agents for Flipkart using LLM models and stable diffusion. Remote job.
Worked on building AI agents for Global Hexon such as stable video diffusion and headshot generation using AI.
Developed a project to recognize scam NFTs and won third prize in an all-India competition by Superteam India.
Led various AI projects and initiatives within the society.

projects_publications.title: Ant-Inspired Route Optimization for Last Mile Delivery
projects_publications.details: I am one of the authors of this research paper published in IEEE.

projects_publications.title: Face-recognition and Dataset Creator
projects_publications.details: Engineered a facial recognition algorithm capable of identifying and categorizing facial features in real-time, while generating a robust dataset for machine learning applications.

projects_publications.title: Watchtower (a shield against scam NFTs)
projects_publications.details: Architected and developed machine learning solutions for detecting and preventing scam NFTs. The project focused on real-time detection and maintaining security for crypto wallets.

projects_publications.title: Full Body Recognizer
projects_publications.details: Developed a holistic body recognition system using deep learning algorithms to analyze human body postures for healthcare and security applications.

certificates.title: Generative AI for Everyone
certificates.details: Acquired foundational knowledge in the lifecycle of a generative AI project, from conception to launch, including how to build effective prompts.

certificates.title: AWS Academy Graduate - AWS Academy Machine Learning Foundations
certificates.details: Completed an intensive course on machine learning fundamentals and AWS cloud services.

certificates.details: Mastered multivariate calculus techniques applicable to machine learning algorithms.
